article:
Mike didn't live too far away from school. He liked to _ to school every day. When it rained, like many _ boys, Mike liked playing in the water.
One afternoon, when the boy came _ , he was all wet. His mother became very _ and said, "Don't play in the water after school."
The next day he was very _ again, and his mother became _ angrier. "I'll tell your _ if you go to play in the water again," she said.
The third day the boy was dry when he came back from school "You are a _ boy today," his mother said. "You didn't play in the water."
"No," Mike answered. "Because there were so many older boys in the water, I couldn't play in it."
